reviews.title: So charming!
reviews.text: We loved this pension. The room was spotless, with a nice balcony with geranium-filled windowboxes. It was extremely quiet, the breakfast was simple but fresh and good, and the location was extremely central - 5 min. to anything in Rothenberg. The adorable old man that ran the place was something out of a book, spoke/understood English just fine. You can book easily in English via the Romantic Road website.

reviews.title: Great value and location
reviews.text: What a gem this hotel is, a few minutes walk to the main Marketplatz and just staying in a 600 year old hotel with it's traditional decor made our stay all the more wonderful. My husband and I stayed there just before Christmas for 2 nights and were totally enchanted by Rothenburg. It was snowing as we walked up from the train station,a casual 10 minute walk. Staying inside the wall is a must.
